ing: 1 (32 fluid ounce) bottle raspberry flavored carbonated water, chilled
1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle white grape juice, chilled
2 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
des: "A delicious clear, cold, non-alcoholic punch that we use at showers, weddings, receptions, etc., at our church. Best if all ingredients are ice cold."
ins: In a large punch bowl, mix together simple syrup, carbonated water, white grape juice and lemon-lime soda.
